workshoptitle: Get Started with Oracle GoldenGate Veridata

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Create Datasource Connections
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to create datasource connections.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Create Groups and Compare Pairs
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to create groups and compare pairs.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Create and Execute Jobs
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to create Jobs and execute them.

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Repair Jobs and Generate SQL Files
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to repair jobs and data.

tutorials.title: Lab 9: View Reports
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to view comparision Reports.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
